page.title: 15Population and Clubs
page.content: Over 18000 people live within the whole D-Block, the majority in the densely populated suburb of Blacon. Another chiefly residential area lies around Stonebridge and Whipcord Lane. Both residental area's community lives are based around the local schools, churches and meeting halls. They offer various activities such as playgroups,scouts and bingo. Locally it is felt that more youth clubs are needed.There are several Entertainment Dancing Troupes, which many families are involved with. Regular bus services allow residents to use Chester's amenities. Many also live within walking distance. Local residents work together to provide extra amenities and events: eg A Community House in Stratford Rd. The carnival organised by the Blacon Camp Residents Association on 30.6.85.
